text: The first game was very short but I really enjoyed my time with it. I haven't played this sequel yet, but I'm excited to as it seems to build upon the first one. The soundtrack is great from what I've heard and this particular theme sets a great mood with its synths.

text: Does this game steal from every Nintendo franchise?
author: Jay DiNItto

text:
Uh, it mainly draws inspiration from Zelda, although with its actual level design it's MUCH more like a more puzzle-oriented Zelda 1 with its open-ended structure and all, which I actually found very welcome seeing how Zelda games have become more and more streamlined in recent years. Excepting Breath of the Wild but that's a complete genre shift and its gameplay isn't even comparable to the 2D titles.

I'm not really sure which other franchise it "steals" (and those are some big quotation marks) from?
